top-movies.name: Top Movies
top-movies.description: A collection of top-rated movies across various genres and eras.

criterion-collection.name: The Criterion Collection
criterion-collection.description: Films from The Criterion Collection, a prestigious series of classic and contemporary films.

animation-shorts.name: Animation Shorts
animation-shorts.description: Golden age animation shorts including Popeye, Betty Boop, and other classic cartoons.

sherlock-holmes.name: Sherlock Holmes
sherlock-holmes.description: Classic detective films featuring the legendary Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson solving mysteries.

vampire-movies.name: Vampire Movies
vampire-movies.description: Classic and iconic vampire films from silent era to modern cinema, featuring Dracula, Nosferatu, and other creatures of the night.

cloak-and-dagger.name: Cloak and Dagger
cloak-and-dagger.description: Swashbuckling adventures of intrigue, espionage, and swordplay - from musketeers and masked avengers to spies and secret agents in historical settings.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.description: Action-packed ninja films featuring martial arts, stealth, and ancient warrior traditions.

samurai.name: Samurai
samurai.description: Epic samurai films showcasing the way of the warrior, honor, and legendary swordsmen from feudal Japan.

knights-and-vikings.name: Knights & Vikings
knights-and-vikings.description: Epic tales of medieval knights and Norse warriors, featuring battles, honor, quests, and legendary heroes from the age of swords and shields.

monster-madness.name: Monster Madness
monster-madness.description: Giant monster movies featuring the legendary kaiju: Godzilla, King Kong, and Gamera. Classic creature features from Japan and beyond.

charlie-chaplin.name: Charlie Chaplin
charlie-chaplin.description: Classic films featuring the legendary Charlie Chaplin, from his early shorts to his greatest masterpieces.

buster-keaton.name: Buster Keaton
buster-keaton.description: Classic films featuring and directed by the legendary Buster Keaton, master of silent comedy and physical humor.

abbott-and-costello.name: Abbott and Costello
abbott-and-costello.description: Classic comedy films featuring the legendary duo Bud Abbott and Lou Costello, masters of slapstick and wordplay.

elia-kazan.name: Elia Kazan
elia-kazan.description: Films directed by Elia Kazan, the acclaimed director known for his work on Broadway and Hollywood classics including 'A Streetcar Named Desire', 'On the Waterfront', and 'East of Eden'.

alfred-hitchcock.name: Alfred Hitchcock
alfred-hitchcock.description: Suspenseful masterpieces from the Master of Suspense, Alfred Hitchcock, featuring psychological thrillers, mysteries, and iconic cinematic moments.

akira-kurosawa.name: Akira Kurosawa
akira-kurosawa.description: Masterful films directed by Akira Kurosawa, one of cinema's greatest filmmakers, known for his epic samurai films and profound human dramas.

billy-wilder.name: Billy Wilder
billy-wilder.description: Brilliant films from Billy Wilder, master filmmaker known for his sharp wit, cynical humor, and genre-defying classics that blend drama, comedy, and film noir.

martial-arts.name: Martial Arts
martial-arts.description: A collection of classic martial arts, kung fu, samurai, and ninja movies from around the world.

sci-fi.name: Science Fiction
sci-fi.description: Explore the future, space, and beyond with classic and contemporary science fiction films.

animation-features.name: Animation Features
animation-features.description: Full-length animated feature films spanning classic Disney, anime, and modern computer-generated masterpieces.

horror.name: Horror
horror.description: Spine-chilling horror films from classic monster movies to modern psychological thrillers.

film-noir.name: Film Noir
film-noir.description: Dark, stylish crime dramas from the golden age of noir cinema.

romance.name: Romance
romance.description: Timeless love stories that capture the heart and soul of cinema.

adventure.name: Adventure
adventure.description: Epic adventures and thrilling journeys across land, sea, and time.

mystery.name: Mystery
mystery.description: Intriguing mysteries and detective stories that keep you guessing until the end.

thriller.name: Thriller
thriller.description: Edge-of-your-seat thrillers that keep tension high from start to finish.

war.name: War
war.description: Powerful war films depicting the courage, sacrifice, and human cost of conflict.

western.name: Western
western.description: Classic westerns featuring cowboys, outlaws, and the untamed frontier.

surrealist-cinema.name: Surrealist Cinema
surrealist-cinema.description: Mind-bending surrealist masterpieces from Luis Buuel, Jean Cocteau, David Lynch, and other visionary directors who challenged conventional narrative and explored the subconscious through dreamlike imagery.

1920s.name: 1920s Cinema
1920s.description: Silent film masterpieces and early talkies from the roaring twenties.

1930s.name: 1930s Cinema
1930s.description: Golden age Hollywood classics from the Great Depression era.

1940s.name: 1940s Cinema
1940s.description: Film noir, wartime dramas, and post-war classics from the 1940s.

1950s.name: 1950s Cinema
1950s.description: Epic spectacles, method acting, and the birth of modern cinema in the 1950s.

1960s.name: 1960s Cinema
1960s.description: New wave movements, counterculture films, and cinematic revolution of the 1960s.

1970s.name: 1970s Cinema
1970s.description: New Hollywood era with groundbreaking auteur films from the 1970s.

1980s.name: 1980s Cinema
1980s.description: Blockbusters, action heroes, and iconic films from the 1980s.

1990s.name: 1990s Cinema
1990s.description: Independent cinema boom and diverse storytelling from the 1990s.

2000s.name: 2000s Cinema
2000s.description: Digital revolution and modern classics from the 2000s.

2010s.name: 2010s Cinema
2010s.description: Streaming era and contemporary cinema from the 2010s.

2020s.name: 2020s Cinema
2020s.description: Latest releases and contemporary films from the 2020s.

canine-cinema.name: Canine Cinema
canine-cinema.description: Heartwarming and adventurous films featuring man's best friend.
